item.title: Installation
item.description: Docker Binary Source Docker If you have Docker installed, then HodDB can be started by pulling the gtfierro/hod:latest Docker image and then starting it with the appropriate parameters. HodDB requires a directory containing a configuration file and the Brick models. When we start the Docker container, we need to mount this directory (referred to as configdir below): 1 2 3$ docker pull gtfierro/hod:latest # you can change 'configdir' to whatever absolute path $ docker run -d --name hod -v `pwd`/configdir:/etc/hod -p 47808:47808 gtfierro/hod:latest You should place the following inside the directory that gets mounted to /etc/hod
